participant_1.name: Evelyn Smith
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, with a strong focus on professional success and a penchant for luxury.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Resilient and straightforward, with a strong sense of duty and appreciation for good food.
participant_2.background: i live in canada. i didn't graduate high school. i'm in the army. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
